General.Name: Cangzhou Dahua Co Ltd
General.Description: Cangzhou Dahua Co., Ltd. produces and sells chemical fertilizers and carbimides in China. The company offers synthetic ammonia, urea, hydrochloric acid, caustic soda, toluene-diisocyanate, and concentrated nitric acid, as well as PVC artificial leather, polycarbonate, and related products. It also exports its products to Southeast Asia, Japan, and South Korea. Cangzhou Dahua Co., Ltd. was founded in 1974 and is based in Cangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 20, Yongji East Road, Cangzhou, China, 061000
